import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import Highlight from '..';

<Meta title="Components/Highlight" />

<Story name="Import" />

# Highlight

Highlight words within a larger body of text.

## Import

```jsx
import { Highlight } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={Highlight} />

## Usage

### Default

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="1. Default">
    <>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, <Highlight>sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua</Highlight>. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in <Highlight>reprehenderit in voluptate</Highlight> velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat <Highlight>nulla pariatur</Highlight>. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in <Highlight highlightColor="#ff9b3f">reprehenderit in voluptate</Highlight> velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat <Highlight highlightColor="#ace6f4">nulla pariatur</Highlight>. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>
